ApplicationDescription: Gifski converts videos to high-quality GIFs.

Connections.Purpose: Gifski sends crash reports to this server.
Connections.DenyConsequences: If you deny this connection, the developers of Gifski won't be notified of any crashes and they can't fix what they don't know about.

Services.Name: NSURLSession
Services.Purpose: Gifski uses this helper process to send crash reports.
